title: Looks Like Ubuntu 23.10 Will Bring Back ZFS on Root Installation Option
description:
Ubuntu 23.10 (Mantic Minotaur) will bring back ZFS on root installation support as an experimental feature in its new desktop installer written in Flutter.

The post Looks Like Ubuntu 23.10 Will Bring Back ZFS on Root Installation Option appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Linux Kernel 6.4 Reaches End of Life, Upgrade to Linux Kernel 6.5 Now
description:
Linux kernel 6.4 reached end of life and all users are now recommended to upgrade their system to the latest Linux 6.5 kernel as soon as possible.

The post Linux Kernel 6.4 Reaches End of Life, Upgrade to Linux Kernel 6.5 Now appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
